questions.question: Which is NOT true about strengths and weaknesses for a character submission

answers.text: Strengths and weakness need to be two sentences minimum
At least one of the strengths/weaknesses must be personality based
Strengths are optional and only weakness are needed

questions.question: A character is allowed to be an assassin

answers.text: If it makes sense in the backstory
If it was a past occupation and they don’t kill anymore
Assassins are not allowed in the RP

questions.question: True or false: Members can RP with a character they plan to submit but hasn’t been approved yet
What is the age range for students attending JMA?
How many total characters are members allowed to have?
How many days must a member wait after getting an egg approved for it to hatch?
How many abilities are hybrids allowed to have?
An RP response can be more than one discord message if

answers.text: A member remembers something else to add after sending the first message
The response exceeds the character count
RPing with more than one person in the same RP
Using someone else’s character because they can’t be online in that moment

questions.question: Which of these IS allowed in the RP

answers.text: Marriage, with characters over seven years old

questions.question: True or false: A member does not need RP levels to have a character with Mindreading
What happens when a member reaches their sixth RP side warning?

answers.text: They are no longer allowed to use Tier unlocks
Lose JMA RP approved for a week
